description:
OK .... Hate this profile stuff .. but it is needed. I am 100% real and 0% BS
Expect the same. Please no Pros no Shows! LOL I am in Tenerife Spain now.
I travel a great deal.
Live in Colombia and Panama most of the year. Yes, I do speak spanish.
I have a house in Calgary Canada as well. That is to say that a site like this is a logical way to get some intimacy and fun and that is all I want ... maybe something clicks and we build a life together ! WhoTF knows right ... but for now good clean fun ... or bad dirty fun! LOL I am a gentleman above all and a very kind man ... loving and caring ... and a drag em down kickarse kinky guy as well LOL Tap me if you want honest straight forward conversation and more ... JaySee
